name: Guardian Pools
tag_list: weekly-pool-maintenance, pool-repairs, pool-service, pool-remodeling, pumps, motors, filters, gas-heaters, heat-pumps
overview:
Guardian Pools has been servicing & repairing pools in the Broward county area since 1965. That’s over 45 years of solid pool experience ready to go to work for you. We know what it takes to service and maintain South Florida swimming pools.

You can rely on our highly-recommended service & repair technicians. They are prompt, courteous & professional. Guardian Pools has the knowledge, experience & staff to handle all your pool service, pool repair and pool remodeling needs.
